32525.<if_woman>「あっ 姉ちゃん！\n こんな所に いたんだ？<else>「: Oh, there you are! I'm glad I found you.

32526.「よかった。\n ちっちゃいアバさまの 言ったとおりだ。\n ……思いって ちゃ:
Good. Tiny Abba was right. I guess feelings
really do reach people!

32527.<if_woman>「おいら 姉ちゃんに これを届けにきたんだよ。<else>「: I came to deliver this to you!

32529.<if_woman>「せっかく 作ってあげたのに\n 忘れていったでしょ？\n:
You didn't forget that I made this for you,
did you? Man, what a scatterbrain!

32530.「……今まで ありがとう。\n 迷惑ばっかりかけて ごめんね。:
Thank you for everything... I'm sorry about
all the trouble I've caused you.

32535.「あっ お前！\n こんな所に いやがったのか？:
Oh, there you are! So you were here after
all.

32536.「あっ！\n あんた こんな所に いたのね？: Ah! So you really were here, huh?

32537.<if_woman>「あっ お姉ちゃん！\n こんな所に いたんだ～？<else: Oh, hey! So you were here after all!

32538.「よかった。\n ちっちゃいアバさまの 言ったとおりだぜ。\n ……思いって ち:
Good. Little Abba was right. I guess feelings
really do get through!

32539.「よかったわ。\n ちっちゃいアバさまの 言ったとおりね。\n ……思いって ち:
Good for you. Just like little Abba said.
Thoughts really do reach people!

32540.「よかった。\n ちっちゃいアバさまの 言ったとおりだよ。\n ……思いって ち:
Good. It's just as little Abba-sama said. I
guess feelings really do reach people!

32541.「オレは お前に これを届けにきたんだ。: I came to deliver this to you.

32542.「あたし あんたに これを届けにきたのよ。: I came to deliver this to you.

32543.<if_woman>「私 お姉ちゃんに これを届けにきたんだよ。<else>「私:
<if_woman>I came to deliver this to my sister.
<else>I came to give this to my brother.
<endif>

32544.「オレが せっかく 作ってやったのに\n 忘れていっただろ？\n ホント お前は:
I made it for you and you forgot it, didn't
you? You really are a scatterbrain.

32545.「せっかく 作ってあげたのに\n 忘れていったでしょ？\n あんたって ホント:
I went to the trouble of making it for you,
but you forgot it, didn't you? You're such a
scatterbrain!

32546.<if_woman>「せっかく 作ってあげたのに\n 忘れていったでしょ？ お姉:
<if_woman>I went to the trouble of making it
for you, but you forgot it, didn't you? You're
really careless, sis.<else>
I went to the trouble of making it for you,
but you forgot all about it, didn't you?
You're so careless, bro!<endif>

32547.「……今まで ありがとうな。\n 迷惑ばっかりかけて 悪かったよ。:
Thank you for everything you've done for me.
I'm sorry for all the trouble I've caused you.

32548.「……今まで ありがと。\n いっぱい迷惑かけて 悪かったわね。:
Thank you for everything. I'm sorry for
causing you so much trouble.

32549.「……今まで ありがとう。\n いっぱい迷惑かけちゃって ごめんね。:
Thank you for everything. I'm sorry for
causing you so much trouble.

65024.「とうとう 目覚めてしまいましたか……。: So, have you finally woken up...?

65025.「闇の底より来たる 災いの王……！:
The King of Calamity has risen from the dark
depths below...!

65026.「滅びの運命は 時を刻み始めました……。:
The fate of our destruction has finally begun
to unfold...

65027.「私はここで 戦う意志を持つ者を待ちましょう。\n あなたたちは 五大陸の 王の:
I shall wait here for those who have the will
to fight. As for you, speak to the rulers of
the five continents about what must be done.
